name: Hazelcast Jet For Pcf
shortDescription: Clickable Hazelcast JET Tile for Pivotal Cloud Foundry – the easiest way to deploy an open source Hazelcast JET cluster on Cloud Foundry.
longDescription: Clickable Hazelcast JET Tile for Pivotal Cloud Foundry – the easiest way to deploy an open source Hazelcast JET cluster on Cloud Foundry.
